entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet publish with net6 can't resolve runtime #62609
  • Is cross compiling CoreCLR for apple silicon possible on a x64 MacOS machine? #62608
  • dotnet on linux does not use available TLS 1.2 cypher #62607
  • FileSystemEventArgs.FullPath does not return a fully qualified path #62606
  • JIT does not always fold inlined constants #62604
  • [API Proposal]: RegexRunner.IsWordChar #62603
    7.0.0
  • File.SetLastWrite time fails on readonly files on Windows #62602
  • Add support for reading, validating, creating, and encrypting COSE messages #62600
    7.0.0
  • Add support for reading, validating, and creating COSE_Sign messages (multiple signers) #62599
    7.0.0
  • Explicit struct size is not always taken into account in code emitted at runtime #62597
  • Add a capability to C#/CLR runtime to report which variable caused Null pointer exception, similar to Java 14 "Helpful NullPointerException". https://openjdk.java.net/jeps/358 #62596
  • ApplicationSettingsBase fails when same attribute appears at class level and at property level #62593
  • Incorrect translation of Ping error codes #62592
  • Unable to set EntryPoint on generated assemblies with System.Reflection.Emit #62591
  • ExecutionContext flow for library code #62589
  • Windows service infrequently crashes on stop operation #62579
  • Obsolete some protected members of Regex{Runner} #62573
    7.0.0
  • Logging Source Generator causes errors and warnings for messages using formatting specifiers #62572
  • classloader NestedStructs case 03, 04, and 05 failing in mono full AOT #62567
    7.0.0
  • Support nested private class for JsonSerializerContext #62566

Closed

  • String Formatting of f100 works differently in .NET 6 #62578
  • What changed in .NET 6 that would affect JsonElement Equals behavior? #62585
  • Forward substitution for relops misses `LCL_FLD` uses #62524
    7.0.0
  • [docs] Update mono workflow doc to use `clr.hosts` subset for working with runtime tests #62581
    7.0.0
  • Update mono runtime tests CI to generate Core_Root without building CoreCLR #62580
    Future
  • App does not Run as a service in a Windows Container #52416
    7.0.0
  • Can't run tests locally MacOS #62586
  • Can we reopen the discussion about JsonIgnoreCondition for Deserialization? #62086
  • DllImportGenerator is failing in Mono llvmfullAOT #62372
  • Libraries build fail #62574
  • System.Text.JSon Source Generator Diagnostic in the error list doesnt link me to docs or navigate me to the file where the issue is #60314
    6.0.x
  • [wasm][interop] Consider switching mono_wasm_object_registry to Map #56965
    7.0.0
  • Running android tests fails with xharness output "Unknown arguments: Debug" #62161
  • Odd behavior difference between Windows 10 (Desktop) and Windows Server (tried up to 2019) #62565
  • System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe not suppot .NET Core 2.x apps #62561
  • UDP Multicast not receiving data #37336
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Populate NativeAOT sources from runtimelab #62611
  • Clear list of OOB packages built on 6.0 #62610
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • A little more regex source generator tweaking #62605
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm][debugger] Avoiding assert on mono runtime #62601
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix custom JsonConverterFactories not working with nested type/property declarations. #62595
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Port Mono to Raspberry Pi, ship as new linux-armv6 RID #62594
    area-Infrastructure-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Unify the namespaces of HashProviderDispenser #62590
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Decrease the startup ceremony #62587
  • Fix __SkipRestorePackages setup for msbuild during tests build #62583
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Improve String.Substring performance #62577
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Allow the main.js file to keep it's name #62576
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add System.Native APIs needed by NativeAOT #62571
  • Build NativeAOT flavor of clrcompression static lib #62570
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Add NativeAOT to build #62569
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add runtime-extra-platforms pipeline to have matching runtime PR and Rolling builds #62564
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Generalize loop pre-header creation and loop hoisting #62560
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Improve ARM64 JIT disassembly #62557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Disable CreateSpan_il test #62598
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix the build #62575
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reenable Mono runtime tests on PRs #62437
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix ReadAsync_ThrowsIfWriterCompletedWithException for PGO #62584
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • HTTP/3: QPACK decoder performance #62470
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Make `gtHasRef` pay attention to LCL_FLD nodes #62568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Skip source gen DLLs in mono AOT #62518
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Doc][Mono] Updated testing document to use clr.hosts; remove references to special mono targets #62588
    documentation, area-Build-mono, runtime-mono
  • App does not Run as a service in a Windows Container #62452
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Add additional binary operations into the RangeCheck analysis. #61662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix some outerloop tests #62559
    area-Meta
  • Convert some old style intrinsics to NamedIntrinsic #62271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [tests] Fix local test runs for mobile #62549
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Support LLVM inline assembly. #62558
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Escape lower-cased type names #62507
    area-Meta
  • CI matrix update: add Ubuntu 21.04 - second attempt #60162
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Switch over miscellaneous DllImports to GeneratedDllImport. #62353
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • More regex source generator tweaks #62539
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm] Use await on task when waiting for tests to complete #62501
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Populate NativeAOT sources from runtimelab #62563
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Port annotations from runtimelab #62562
  • Using ReadOnlySpan<char> on SymbolicRegexRunner #62542
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [build] Create clr.host subset to remove patching step for mono runtime tests #62500
    area-Infrastructure
  • Improve loop JitDump output #62556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Skip native composite ReadyToRun images as inputs to Crossgen2 #62537
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoid deadlock with ConfigurationManager #62209
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Remove string allocation from XmlTextEncoder.WriteCharEntity #61774
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Update libunwind to v1.6.2 #62092
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't create multiple large files at the same time #62519
    area-System.IO, test enhancement
  • Removing trailing dot from a SNI host in TLS #62540
    area-System.Net.Security
  • PE loader/image investigations #61938
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Initial changes for emscripten 2.0.34 #62499
    area-Build-mono
  • Store string-builder as a field and clear when reuse + IndexOfAny + ArrayPool #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
  • Mark overflow fix for regions #60646
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Optimize System.Diagnostics.TraceSource #60464
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, needs more info, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] fix issue where HTTP2 connection could be scavenged but not disposed #62236
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Enforce HTTP request Content-Length correctness #62541
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Backport all CI matrix changes from 7.0 to reelase/6.0 #62538
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use "pipeline-caching" for coreclr and libraries builds #62464
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 #61934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Reduce number of calls to setTimer #62433
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 6.0.x
  • CI matrix change: add Windows Server 2022 #60163
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make tests pass on AVX only host again #62544
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-maui] Backport MacCatalyst process start support #62520
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Android] Prevent potential out of bounds write on Android #62275
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • Rewrite XslNumber.ConvertToDecimal #55868
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • CI matrix: Add windows 20H2 - fix TLS1.3 issue #62435
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Refactoring XmlConvert #60285
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Fix XmlSchema does not correctly validate xs:NMTOKENS type restrictions with enumeration #60544
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Add Browsable Attribute support. #62045
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Fix range checks for "i >= 0 && i < cns" patterns #61569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Ini` #60368
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • CI matrix change: Add OSX 12 arm #59085
    blocked, area-Infrastructure
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono

entry.content:
PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable dependabot in the SDK repo to keep dependencies up to date #22994
    7.0.1xx
  • Error : HRESULT: 0x80070057 #22990
  • dotnet tool restore interactive doesn't prompt for DeviceFlow since .NET 6 SDK #22987
  • FrameworkReference silently overrides NuGet resolved package versions and ignores dependency constraints. #22986
  • Support for dotnet-watch to reload when server listening log is on a single line missing from 5.0.4xx #22980
  • With .NET 6.0.2xx, dotnet tool could not list installed tools #22979
    6.0.2xx
  • After install 6.0 GA arm64 SDK on Mac OS Monterey(12.0.1) Parallels VM on M1 machine, use ` dotnet --info ` met error "Unhandled exception." #22978

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #22992
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Unskip Blazor Integration Tests #22945
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Update application insights version #22974
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge pull request #22947 from dotnet/marcpopMSFT-macosleg #22968
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge pull request #22947 from dotnet/marcpopMSFT-macosleg #22970
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge pull request #22947 from dotnet/marcpopMSFT-macosleg #22971
    Area-Infrastructure
  • upgrade ubuntu version #22879
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to Ubuntu 1804 (5.0.4xx) #22965
  • Merge pull request #22947 from dotnet/marcpopMSFT-macosleg #22969
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge 6.0.2xx to main #22966
  • Update .vsts-ci-richnav.yml #22916
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: "file private" visibility #5529
  • [Proposal]: Disable CS0436 by default #5528

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [LSP] Pass in LSP document version instead of workspace document version for semantic token caching #58233
  • Change of behavior in symbol comparison with SymbolEqualityComparer #58226
  • Add a code cleanup option that turns all C# files to use file-scoped namespace #58225
  • Allow customization of auto-generated XML comments #58224
  • Ability to auto add string intrapolation character "$" at the beginning of the string if a valid "{" is typed inside the string. #58223
  • Searching for all references by child class #58222
  • Add Visual Studio settings to configure global, implicit, and global implicit usings #58221
  • Ensure Coding Styles Suggested or Refactored are Relevant to the Used / Target Version of The Language #58220
  • The classes listed by the C# overrides glyph should be sorted by their depth in the class hierarchy. #58219
  • Resolve CS0535 for methods with Async suffix by auto-implementing async methods #58218
  • Provide visual studio 2022 templates without top level statement, just make it an option #58217
  • C# Interface template is defaulted to 'internal' #58216
  • Code Cleanup: Fixer to sort fields,props, methods etc. based on preferred order #58215
  • Show references only to the selected Override method, not all the references to all the base class methods. #58214
  • When viewing options, it does not show that some have been overridden by .editorconfig . #58213
  • Non-nullable value detected as nullable #58211
  • Leading trivia contains SingleLineCommentTrivia instead of SingleLineDocumentationCommentTrivia during build #58210

Closed

  • It looks like we are lacking tests for AnalyzeDataFlow/AnalyzeControlFlow APIs across multiple top level statement, some things might not work properly. #54514
    Backlog
  • Strange behavior when passing `null` for ReadOnlyMemory/ReadOnlySpan #58160
  • Avoid calculating inferred delegate type unnecessarily in conversions and type inference #58106
    17.1
  • Broken double-checked locking (data race) in RazorDocumentServiceProviderWrapper #58004
    17.1
  • Create integration tests for value tracking #53207
    17.1
  • Automatically add missing using directives #45853
    Backlog
  • Renaming file(with type) freezes UI #58188
    17.1
  • Feature xxx is currently unavailable due to an internal error. StreamJsonRpc.RemoteInvocationException: Cannot find the old value #58102
    17.1
  • new AdhocWorkspace throws NullReferenceException on API startup #58121
    17.1
  • IDE0005 not reported as build warning #58103

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58232
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58231
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Runtests experiment #58229
    Area-Interactive
  • Revert "Merge pull request #58024 from jasonmalinowski/fix-removal-an… #58228
    Area-IDE
  • NullableWalker - properly handle BoundNoPiaObjectCreationExpression #58227
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Remove usage of weak-value-source for smart-open-scope references #58212
    Area-IDE
  • SourceLink quality of life improvements #58209
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #58205
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Update localized branch to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58230
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix VisualStudioActiveDocumentTracker to handle frames without text b… #58049
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update several ExpressionCompiler unit tests for inferred delegate types #58203
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Analyzers to 3.3.3 #58154
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Avoid calculating inferred delegate type unnecessarily in conversions and type inference #58115
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58069
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Respond to changes in project context to support w/out navbar and mul… #58195
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • OmniSharp options #58208
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Simplify lazy initialization in RazorDocumentServiceProviderWrapper #58063
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix generator caching in compiler server #57177
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58207
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58206
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add support for nullable analysis in interpolated string handler constructors #57780
    Area-Compilers
  • Find unit test assemblies whose names differ from the project directory name #58194
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Handling defaults provided by IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource #57685
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify how our FatalError type works and introduce a severity concept #58094
    Area-IDE
  • Port CSharpCodeActions and CSharpFindReferences to the new test harness #58037
    Area-IDE
  • Add and implement `IImplicitIndexerReferenceOperation` #58200
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range
  • Extract Method: top level method that is static should create a static extraction #58021
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Add test from PR 50799 for impl PR 56853 #57752
    Area-Compilers, Test, Community
  • Parameter null-checking analyzer and fixer #58182
    Area-Analyzers
  • Use ElasticSpace instead of ElasticZeroSpace #58152
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Model validation errors only include the C# property path, rather than the original input path #38925
  • CloseOnAuthenticationExpiration Does not exist in class properties #38922
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext #38921
  • Better Support for multiple forms on the same Razor Page #38920
  • Expose per-request telemetry for number of bytes sent from server to client. #38919
  • Expose per-request telemetry for number of bytes sent from client to server. #38918
  • HttpContext RequestAborted no longer works. #38917
  • Blazor cannot execute OnChange Event #38916
  • Issues running .net 5 / 6 console app on VS2022 #38913
  • Razor class libraries static resources are not available in another project #38924
  • Adding new MediaType to NewtonsoftJsonInputFormatter doesn't work #38911
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Option for adding custom css class for asp-for input tag helper #38910
    Backlog
  • Minimal API F# RouteValue is Null #38906

Closed

  • Negotiate auth handler LDAP integration goes in infinate loop when AD groups have circular relationship on Linux #38769
    7.0-preview1
  • Linux: RBAC claims resolution hangs if nested groups have circular dependencies #37225
    7.0-preview1
  • StatusCodes: improve documentation #38833
    7.0-preview1
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • DefaultDisplayTemplates: semantic HTML for ObjectTemplate #38915
  • Blazor SDK Targets Packaging Fixes #38844
    7.0-preview1
  • The purpose to add `app.UseAuthorization()` middleware when using a default template to create a none-Authentication application #38887
  • Blazor wasm hot reload refresh server only accessible at ws:// in Visual Studio #38888
  • How to generate Component.razor.g.cs? #38908
  • Why does the following middleware works perfectly well in Blazor Server App #38795
    Discussions
  • Hosted service prevents app to start completely without startup class #38698
  • blazor webassembly OnInitializedAsync will call many time? #38777
  • Getting source IP behind proxy #38607
  • Img tags do not receive scope identifier in .Net 6 MVC Core #38450
  • Excessive memory usage using endpoint.MapControllerRoute - never ending story (continuation of #30092) #38468

PullRequests

Merged

  • Override default MicrosoftNETTestSdkVersion #38923
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix RedisCache update that breaks usage against older redis servers #38860
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • LdapAdapter: Keep track of already processed groups to account for circular references #38817
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • API doc updates #38852
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • HTTP/2: Improve incoming header performance #38834
    area-runtime
  • Using DictionaryKeyPolicy during ProblemDetails.Errors conversion to JSON #38853
    area-mvc
  • Prevent SignalR Hub from being cached from CDN on LongPolling #38901
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][wasm] dotnet.js modularization #38721
    area-blazor
  • Add support for GitHub Codespaces prebuilds #38793
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-dump collect do not create any dumps (dotnet 6 on OSX Apple Chip) #2779

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] Need spacing between recipe items #3720
  • [Enhancement] Edited recipes should remain in place #3719
  • SearchBarHandler on iOS subscribes to wrong text changed event #3717
  • Adding an Entitlements.plist breaks the iOS project #3715
  • Maui Essentials will always open settings in split-screen if above Android N #3712
  • Net.Maui Blazor not running on Android 7.1 Tablet #3711

Closed

  • [Bug] CollectionView Crash on Android using a custom header #3162
  • Implement IsClippedToBounds for new layouts #2334

PullRequests

Created

  • Added support for hosted services #2244 #3718
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android, iOS] Implement IsTextPredictionEnabled property in SearchBar #3713
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Clip layouts to bounds #3709

Merged

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Organize and centralize HandlerExtensions #3716

Updated

  • [android] reduce JNI calls by moving logic into Java #3372
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Return a blank Label when LoadTemplate is null to prevent Hot Reload crashes #3692
  • Allow to use string to define StrokeShape in XAML #3256
    area/Xaml </>, area/drawing ✏️
  • Add FormattedText property support to Label in Controls #3637
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fix ProjectReference for Controls targeting/runtime pack projects #3689
  • iOS: Load fonts from filename instead of NSData in CGDataProvider #3696
    area/fonts 🅰️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make context.Database.Migrate able to find migrations using an assembly name and namespace #26957
  • Store column order in model snapshot #26956
  • Query issue after migrating from EF 2.2 to EF6 #26955
  • Migration with name 'DateOnly' breaks following migrations with NRE #26954
  • Verification of nullable in debug/release builds #26952

Closed

  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite SqliteConnection does not support DateTime #26876
  • Using EF & SQLite crashes in aspnet:5.0-alpine docker image with Segmentation Fault #25703
    6.0.0
  • Table-valued parameters are not allowed in remote calls between servers #26951
  • Navigations to/from join entity are not fixed up when new many-to-many relationship is created #26886
    7.0.0
  • Query: Investigate supporting simple patterns for keyset pagination #9115
  • .NET 6 breaks EF Core 2.2 #26950

PullRequests

Created

  • Preserve synchronization context in ExecutionStrategy #26953

Merged

  • Fixup navigations to/from join entity when new many-to-many relationship is created #26853
  • Static analysis: spelling #26925
  • Static analysis: minor small changes #26946
  • Static analysis: use range indexer and index from end #26910
  • Static analysis: using declarations and await using #26911
  • Static analysis: make members static #26947

Updated

  • Temporal table support for owned and table splitting scenarios #26935
  • [6.0.2] Call sync connection close instead of async #26943
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • [6.0.x] Fix to #26451 - Temporal Table: Owned Entities support #26526
    blocked
  • SQL row value comparison syntax #26936

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix dependency update from dotnet/sdk #12782
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 6.0.2xx SDK, validation-installer-.NET 6.0.2xx SDK #installer-120317-.NET6.0.2xxSDK #12778

PullRequests

Merged

  • Remove un-needed version properties #12683
  • Update to ubuntu 18.04 #12775
  • Update to ubuntu 18.04 #12776
